author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Please add (at least)
```
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot.

Also, have you thought about more descriptive names? `Noise` is pretty generic.

Great, thank you will do. I plan to rename to SeisNoise.jl.

Cheers,

Tim

On Fri, Jun 28, 2019 at 3:43 AM Fredrik Ekre <notifications@github.com>
